DOC.brief_summary: The use HPV test cervical screening raise concern effect positive HPV result woman 's psychological well . This nested psychosocial study COCY trial ( IRB No . UW 09-377 ; PI : Prof Hextan Ngan ) , aim evaluate psychosocial impact HPV positivity Hong Kong Chinese woman modulate effect educational intervention impact . Potential participant identify among joint COCY trial . Participants randomize two group , namely control group intervention group . The control group participant receive smear result HPV leaflet post . The intervention group receive leaflet counseling session HPV . Self-administered questionnaire use assess participant ' psychological condition receipt smear result two month afterward . It hypothesize level emotional distress measure smear result notification great two month afterward participant . Furthermore , participant intervention group lower psychological distress control group two month receipt smear result .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Ethnic Chinese woman enrol COCY trial , whose smear result normal cytology HPV positivity 2 . Women willing attend colposcopy 3 . Literate Chinese language 4 . Have give verbal consent participate study Women unable provide consent participation .
